title: Noise
creator_credit: Don Dickerson and Bailey Film Productions
brief_description: Raises such questions as: What is the difference between sound and noise? How does noise effect the individual? As the tempo of urban life increases, must the amount of noise also increase? Explores the effect of noise on the daily activities of a family at home, at school, at work, and indicates ways to control noise. Suitable for primary school level.
